title: Be and rp
body: I want to know wether that thing with the rp/ip will continiud or they will back the unlimited rp/ip

replies.body: Hey there, I'm not sure I totally understand your question, but For The River's info is pretty spot on.  Check out our[ Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908) too for more info on Blue Essence, and let me know if you have any questions.
If you're talking about the PBE server, yeah, Your riot points and BE will reset to 8000rp & 5BE Everyday for the time being, Due to many purchases at the same time causing server overload.
They will change IP into BE. RP stays the same.
